about_the_game:
Experience a NEW ERA of social deduction gaming! Outsmart your opponents, form unlikely alliances, trick & deceive to stay alive! Work together to complete tasks but watch out for the impostors! They're lurking in the shadows, ready to sabotage your efforts and kill you off one by one…
Enjoy countless game scenarios with your friends in this 4-15 player party-game, talk your way out of trouble with in-game voice chat, and immerse yourself in an ever-changing world with surprises around every corner!

Impostors:
  • Kill innocents
  • Morph into other players to frame them
  • Clean up bodies to hide evidence
  • Sabotage the map
  • Don’t get caught

Innocents:
  • Complete your tasks
  • Fix the lights and generator
  • Vote out the Impostors
  • Don’t get killed
  • Use abilities to help your team

Features:
  • In-game text chat
  • In-game voice & proximity chat
  • Customizable Gameplay: change the number of impostors, discussion & voting time, active roles, mini games, and more!
  • Host public and private lobbies!
  • Featured Map: Nuclear Power Plant

name: Impostors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600 | Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700X | Intel Core i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 | NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Step into the world of Impostors: A social deduction game riddled with intrigue, excitement, and a dash of mystery. Here, deceit is the name of the game, trust is a luxury you can scarcely afford, and FUN is our most sacred rule!
